title: Gradle quarkusUpdate does not work behind proxy
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm behind a corporate proxy. In my `settings.gradle` on my Quarkus service, I have to go through an internal Artifactory to get Gradle plugins:

```groovy
pluginManagement {
    repositories {
        mavenLocal()
        maven {
            url 'my-corporate-repo'
        }
    }
    plugins {
        id "${quarkusPluginId}" version "${quarkusPluginVersion}"
    }
}
```

However, `quarkusUpdate` uses an init-script] that sets a repository where I cannot get the OpenRewrite Gradle plugin:

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/2fa75a15e9b5c73990a7ca01ca2678161c0d3e3d/independent-projects/tools/devtools-common/src/main/resources/openrewrite-init.gradle#L6

There does not seem to be a parameter where I can define my own repository.

### Expected behavior

Should update Quarkus

### Actual behavior

When I run `./gradlew quarkusUpdate --platformVersion=3.8.1` I get the following error:

```
> Configure project :
The 'sonarqube' task depends on compile tasks. This behavior is now deprecated and will be removed in version 5.x. To avoid implicit compilation, set property 'sonar.gradle.skipCompile' to 'true' and make sure your project is compiled, before analysis has started.
The 'sonar' task depends on compile tasks. This behavior is now deprecated and will be removed in version 5.x. To avoid implicit compilation, set property 'sonar.gradle.skipCompile' to 'true' and make sure your project is compiled, before analysis has started.

> Task :quarkusUpdate
quarkusUpdate is experimental, its options and output might change in future versions
Detected project Java version: 21
Detected project Java version: 21
Instructions to update this project from '3.7.3' to '3.8.1':
The configured Quarkus registries did not provide any compatibility information for the following extensions in the context of the currently recommended Quarkus platforms:
 io.quarkiverse.micrometer.registry:quarkus-micrometer-registry-otlp:3.2.4
Recommended Quarkus platform BOM updates:
Update: io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom:pom:3.7.3 -> 3.8.1

Extensions from io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom:

Resolved io.quarkus:quarkus-updates-recipes:1.0.14 with 1 recipe(s) to update from 3.7.3 to 3.8.1 (initially made for OpenRewrite GRADLE plugin version: 6.7.0)
OpenRewrite recipe generated: /tmp/quarkus-project-recipe-14694413892494608831.yaml



 ------------------------------------------------------------------------
Executing:
/mnt/c/repos/helm-test-service/gradlew --console plain --stacktrace --init-script /tmp/openrewrite-init15121247045106955133gradle rewriteRun

Starting a Gradle Daemon, 1 busy and 5 stopped Daemons could not be reused, use --status for details

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Could not resolve all files for configuration 'classpath'.
> Could not resolve org.openrewrite:plugin:6.7.0.
  Required by:
      unspecified:unspecified:unspecified
   > Could not resolve org.openrewrite:plugin:6.7.0.
      > Could not get resource 'https://plugins.gradle.org/m2/org/openrewrite/plugin/6.7.0/plugin-6.7.0.pom'.
         > Could not GET 'https://plugins.gradle.org/m2/org/openrewrite/plugin/6.7.0/plugin-6.7.0.pom'. Received status code 403 from server: Forbidden

* Try:
```
